statements: SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date, course_id, course_name, course_progress FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, course_name, course_progress FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 201 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_progress > 50 AND enrollment_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT course_id, COUNT(student_id) AS student_count FROM student_enrollment GROUP BY course_id HAVING student_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date, course_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM student_enrollment JOIN course_progress ON student_enrollment.student_id = course_progress.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_id FROM student_enrollment
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM course_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50
SELECT student_name, course_progress.progress_percentage FROM student_enrollment INNER JOIN course_progress ON student_enrollment.student_id = course_progress.student_id

SELECT student_name, course_id, progress_percentage FROM student_enrollment JOIN course_progress ON student_enrollment.student_id = course_progress.student_id WHERE progress_percentage < 50 ORDER BY student_name
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, progress_percentage FROM course_progress WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_id, progress_percentage FROM student_enrollment INNER JOIN course_progress ON student_enrollment.student_id = course_progress.student_id;
SELECT recommendation_id, course_id, recommendation_text FROM course_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_id, progress_percentage FROM student_enrollment JOIN course_progress ON student_enrollment.student_id = course_progress.student_id;

SELECT student_name, course_id, progress_percentage FROM student_enrollment JOIN course_progress ON student_enrollment.student_id = course_progress.student_id WHERE progress_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_id, recommendation_text FROM student_enrollment JOIN course_recommendations ON student_enrollment.student_id = course_recommendations.student_id;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT name, email FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, description, credit_hours FROM course_catalog ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, progress, completion_date FROM course_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT name, recommended_course_id, recommendation_date FROM student_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, description, credit_hours FROM course_catalog WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_id, progress, completion_date FROM course_progress WHERE progress < 50 ORDER BY completion_date ASC;

SELECT se.name, cc.course_name, sr.recommendation_date FROM student_enrollment se JOIN student_recommendations sr ON se.student_id = sr.student_id JOIN course_catalog cc ON sr.recommended_course_id = cc.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM enrollments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, recommended_course_id, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit < 4 ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM enrollments WHERE grade='A';
